definition: Airbus (abbr. for 空中客車|空中客车[Kong1 zhong1 Ke4 che1])

sentences.english: Airbus' A320s reach their final assembly in the northern port city of Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 空客A320的總裝是在北部港城天津完成。

sentences.english: Its banking industry is based in London. There are exceptions—think of Airbus in Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 當然也有例外，比如圖盧茲的空客集團。

sentences.english: In this case, we're talking about an Airbus A340 which was manufactured in France.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏討論的是法國製造的空客A340。

sentences.english: The airline has purchased six Airbuses for its fleet.
sentences.chinese: 該航空公司已經採購了六架空客飛機。

sentences.english: Boeing and Airbus have manufacturing operations in China.
sentences.chinese: 波音和空客都在中國有製造業務。

sentences.english: Also on the first day, European planemaker Airbus got some good news.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲飛機制造商空客在航展的第一天就有喜訊傳來。

sentences.english: The European company Airbus has delieved delivered the first Afri 28 A320 aircraft assembled at its factory in China.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲空客公司第一架在中國組裝的A320飛機下線。

sentences.english: Boeing and Airbus have already 3D-printed certain pieces of their aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 波音和空客都已經3D打印的某些部分的飛機。

sentences.english: There are exceptions—think of Airbus in Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 當然也有例外，比如圖盧茲的空客集團。

sentences.english: Currently Boeing and Airbus each control about half the Chinese market for big planes.
sentences.chinese: 目前，波音和空客分別控制中國約一半的大飛機市場。

sentences.english: This investigation will determine whether there's enough evidence to put Airbus on trial.
sentences.chinese: 這次調查將決定是否有足夠證據使空客公司接受審判。

sentences.english: I glad China dared to head on Boeing and Airbus.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興中國敢正面挑戰波音和空客。

sentences.english: We could move on to Boeing and Airbus with what we have to offer in avionics," says Seager.
sentences.chinese: 我們也會繼續爲空客和波音提供航電設備。

sentences.english: The production capacity of the Airbus final assembly line project in Tianjin is increasing continuously.
sentences.chinese: 空客天津總裝線的生產能力正在持續“爬坡”。

definition: COMAC, Chinese aeronautics company (abbr. for 中國商用飛機|中国商用飞机[Zhong1 guo2 Shang1 yong4 Fei1 ji1])

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1
He2 lan2 Huang2 jia1 Hang2 kong1

definition: Rolls-Royce (UK company)/also written 勞斯萊斯|劳斯莱斯[Lao2 si1 Lai2 si1]
pinyin: Luo2 er3 si1 · Luo2 yi1 si1
